title: Ubehage's EasyCopy v2 (Final Release v2.0.0)
description:
Ubehage's EasyCopy v2 (Final Release v2.0.0)
--------------------------------------------

I present here a program made for nerds like myself!

With this program you can copy and move around with files.
You can make jobs for copying certain files time and time again.
And so on....

Fuck my capabilities into describing my own shit :)

See for yourself, screenshots here: 
http://i.imgur.com/ocNlNGG.jpg 
http://i.imgur.com/GAxZKfk.jpg


/Ubehage


Fixes in this release:
- If you selected to shut down Windows after copying, it would do so even if you cancelled the job.
- Added a warning if you select to delete source files even if copying has failed.

Known problems waiting to be fixed:
- Optimized buffer for HDD, CD, DVD, Blu-Ray, Network, .....
  As of now, the buffer is set to HDD-optimization and nothing else
